svaqdhAyaiq namO# vaH pitarO maqnyavEq namO# vaH pitarO GOqrAyaq pita#rOq namO# vOq ya Eqtasmi#n ~MlOqkEstha yuqShmA(gg)stE&nuq yE$&smin ~MlOqkE mAM tE&nuq ya Eqtasmi#n ~MlOqkE stha yUqyaM tEShAqM ~Mvasi#ShThA BUyAstaq yE$&smin ~MlOqkE#&haM tEShAqM ~Mvasi#ShThO BUyAsaqM prajA#patEq na tvadEqtAnyaqnyO viSvA# jAqtAniq 
pariqtA ba#BUva | 21
